duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for all assigned category(ies) inbound raw material management.
Ensure timely and accurate PO Issuance.
Collaborate with Logistics Team to determine appropriate transportation mode and control freight cost.
Troubleshoot and resolve inbound raw material delays.
Collaborate with Strategic Buyers, local supply chain team, and broader business teams as required.
Support vendor payment process and help in resolving any payment discrepancies with vendors.
Optimize Raw Material Inventory.
Maximize Operational Efficiency with Right Quantity / Right Quality focus.
Reduce Working Capital Requirements by minimizing excess raw material inventory.
Support Strategic Procurement on new raw material set-up process along with 2nd source initiatives.
Track Vendor Execution KPI’s and assist with supplier scorecard data.
Analyze inbound raw material process structure, identify areas of improvement, and lead change initiatives.
Manage priorities from multiple internal customers while remaining professional and thorough.
Attends training sessions external and internal to keep on top of new technology and innovation.
Aligns own goals in accordance with goals of upper management.
Develops superior knowledge of supply chain operations and organizational awareness.
Work to attain positive, cooperative relationships with internal colleagues across divisions and responsibilities.
Effectively use communication channels for proper coordination within the office and other locations.
Portray a positive image of the company and self when interacting with customers and colleagues.
Prepare and submit daily and ad hoc reports.
Participate in the development and training of new employees.
Willingness to work outside normal business hours, depending on business need.

education_certification.credential: University Degree in Business Administration or in a related field preferred (Logistics/Supply Chain)
